mapper.select: SELECT UF.id AS support_id , UF.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , UF.type , UF.content , UF.file_id , I.file_url , UF.created_at , UF.answer_content , UF.answered_at FROM USER_SUPPORT UF INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = UF.user_id LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE I ON I.file_id = UF.file_id ORDER BY UF.created_at DESC
